name: Apex Companion for Legends-PRO
description:
This Unofficial App is a compendium of knowledge, tips and useful tools for Apex Legends Battle Royale and Save the World players! The ultimate companion, guide, Characters and map for apex legends!

Features:

*List of all Legends characters
- tactical ability's
- passive ability's
- ultimate ability's

* List of all weapons
- Stats and Damage

* PC Requirements

* World Map

This is early version of app , and it will be updated in regular basis.

Note : This is an Unofficial Community Driven Companion App and has NO affiliation with Apex Legends.


Disclaimer:
This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Respawn Entertainment, Apex Legends, Titanfall or any partners. All credit goes to the Apex Legends developers and designers. Only in game location names are used in the app and are copyright to their respective owners. It is designed as a companion reference app. Usage for this educational guide falls within fair use guidelines.
